short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock badges and get rewarded with exclusive perks for visiting your favorite sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect badges visiting the sites you love around the web and unlock offers, deals and other experiences with Enefits Open Rewards.
